(2) The 250th position sits in the middle of the rankings where wealth differences between adjacent positions are relatively small, making it more susceptible to volatility than top positions. (3) Over a 33-day period, stock market movements and asset revaluations can cause 5-10% swings in net worth, potentially shifting multiple ranking positions. (4) Without historical data on volatility at this specific rank, I must rely on general principles of wealth dynamics.
